body:
Okay, so I blew away all of my ~/.spack files and anything else ( I think ) that knew about my old
work using spack on cray.  I do a fresh clone from github of spack and now when I try to build a package on my cray XC CLE 6.0up04 system I get this:

/scratch1/users/hpp/spack@ga-fe1:/scratch1/users/hpp/spack> (develop)spack install libhio
==> Error: Compiler configuration contains entries with duplicate specification (gcc@7.3.0, cray-cnl6-haswell) in the following files:
	/users/hpp/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml: 7 times
	/users/hpp/.spack/compilers.yaml: 7 times


I use not to see this.  Anyone know what's going on?

@junghans
title: whats going on with cray systems and head of develop
